Class AudioWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hcm.ssj.core.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AudioWriter
extends Mp4Writer
    Audio writer for SSJ to create mp4-audio-files.
    Created by Frank Gaibler on 21.01.2016.
